sn1.68:1.1: “By what is the world shut in?
sn1.68:1.2: On what is the world established?
sn1.68:1.3: By what is the world ensnared?
sn1.68:2.1: “The world is shut in by death;
sn1.68:2.2: The world is established on suffering;
sn1.68:2.3: The world is ensnared by craving;
sn1.68:2.4: It is enveloped by old age. ”
